projects.title: Axi.com
projects.tagline: Trading platform enhancements with smarter backend logic.
projects.desc: Restructured and optimized core parts of the application logic, introducing modular, reusable code across the platform. Improved the overall usability and functionality of the admin panel, and contributed to several new features now used by thousands of active traders.

projects.title: CruiseOffers
projects.tagline: Better user experience through code refactoring and new features.
projects.desc: Refactored and modernized a large portion of the platform’s backend and frontend code. Introduced clear business logic separation, improved the usability of the admin interface, and built visible new features currently in production and accessible to end users.

projects.title: Dutify – Microsoft Teams Bot
projects.desc: Implemented a full video recording workflow for a Microsoft Teams bot. Built and optimized the logic from capturing raw byte streams to encoding, muxing, and syncing audio/video tracks. This feature enabled automatic meeting recordings, playback integration, and more advanced team reporting tools.

projects.title: Holberton CRM System
projects.tagline: Smart student lifecycle management with modular architecture.
projects.desc: Designed and built an internal CRM system for Holberton School Azerbaijan to manage students, courses, and progression. Implemented role-based access control (RBAC), modular service layers, and unit tests for reliability and scalability. As a team lead, guided architectural decisions, integrated frontend with backend, and collaborated with DevOps for streamlined deployment.

projects.title: Yallı
projects.tagline: Find your fellow countrymen wherever you live
projects.desc: Yallı is a social platform designed for Azerbaijanis living abroad. Users can discover and connect with locals in their current country and build stronger ties with the community. It features an intuitive user interface, interactive map, and customizable profiles.

projects.title: StudenV
projects.desc: StudenV is a digital community designed for students. The platform enables them to share experiences, make new friends, and exchange knowledge. With features like events, forums, and resource sections, it helps make academic life more social and rewarding.

projects.title: Fully Pictured Solutions
projects.desc: Fully Pictured Solutions is a platform offering professional photo and video services. Clients can easily book sessions for weddings, events, or portraits, browse portfolios, and get detailed information about services. It stands out with its aesthetic design and user-friendly experience.

projects.title: VitaMail
projects.desc: VitaMail is a fast and accurate email verification tool that helps users check the validity and activity status of email addresses. It supports bulk verification and provides real-time results to help maintain clean mailing lists.

projects.title: AI Tools
projects.desc: AI Tools offers a collection of free AI-powered tools for text generation, image analysis, social media content creation, and more. With a simple interface and practical output, the platform makes AI accessible and easy to use.

projects.title: Boston Pro Car Service
projects.desc: Boston Pro Car Service provides luxury limousine and chauffeur services in Boston and surrounding areas. Users can easily book airport transfers, special events, or corporate rides with premium vehicles.

projects.title: Appro Appliance Service
projects.desc: Appro Appliance Service is a professional platform offering same-day repair for home appliances. Users can request service for refrigerators, ovens, washers, and more through a simple booking form.
